title: Smart Home Automation System
description: Developed a comprehensive smart home automation system for university graduation project, featuring IP wireless cameras for security and control. Designed integrated circuits to address various abnormal events, including smoke detection, fire detection, and temperature control.

title: International Roaming Services Launch
description: Led the development and launch of international roaming services for a German MNO operator, implementing advanced 5G roaming capabilities and IMS services.

title: Mobile Network BI Dashboard
description: Designed and implemented comprehensive Business Intelligence dashboards using QlikSense and Microsoft Power BI for monitoring mobile network quality, performance metrics, and KPIs across all network elements.

title: Hybridverse Blockchain Platform
description: Co-founded a platform connecting blockchain to decentralized operations, including real-world data validation, e-voting, and digital asset generation.
